amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to ensuring that Medicare is not raided to bailout insurance companies under the President's health care overhaul.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 565 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 565 proposed by Senator Rubio. (consideration: CR S1972-1973; text: CR S1973) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to ensuring that Medicare is not raided to bailout insurance companies under the President's health care overhaul.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 565 proposed by Senator Rubio.
